entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.OpenApi does not support IFormFile with Native AOT enabled #61288
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61287
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, httpsys-header-symbols, json #61286
  • event OnChange of Component forms is not fired #61289
  • Blazor: StateCannotChange() method to lock the UI #61279
  • Perf regression: json, single_query #61277
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, https, mvc #61276
  • Replace WebAssembly Hot Reload code with Microsoft.DotNet.HotReload.Agent.nupkg #61272

Closed

  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, multiple_queries #61275
  • Some ASP.NET Core shared framework assemblies are no longer crossgenned. #60174
  • SignalR uncaught exception in Blazor Webassembly using automatic reconnect #61184
  • RequestHeaderEncodingSelector doesn't default to UTF8 #61189
  • blazor hot reload does not work in msix packaged winforms app #61224
  • Problems getting System.Net.NetworkCredential inside docker container. #61278
  • OpenApi doc generation throws when using length annotations on a nullable dictionary #61259
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #61257
  • Perf regression: updates #61256

PullRequests

Created

  • Include all required shims when building in VMR #61282
    area-infrastructure
  • Migrating to the new solution file format - .slnx #61273
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove enableRichCodeNavigation from default-build.yml #61217
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `24a9e94` to `52204f7` #61261
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `24a9e94` to `52204f7` #61260
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.16 #61283
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 9.0.5 #61284
    area-infrastructure
  • Update servicing milestones for May #61285
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Make PublishAllBuildsAssetsInThisJob available in Signing.props #61271
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25180.3 #61244
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61216
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61215
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.x
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • Ensure project.assets.json files are unique for SiteExtensions in VMR #61270
    area-infrastructure
  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview4
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Inconsistent footer scrolling in CollectionView when EmptyView as string #28765
  • Multiple notifications for SelectionChanged in a CollectionView when the view model is added with addSingleton #28763
  • [WinUI][dotnet8] Down Arrow does not call KeyDown event with cursor at '0' position in Entry #28762
  • [Testing] Reenable flaky UI test with Issue19214Test #28760
  • Deprecate platform-specifics that run on ListView #28757
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Recipe Demo App launch screen logo doesn't show up. #28751
  • Mixed Content: The page at '<URL>}' was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure XMLHttpRequest endpoint '<URL>'. This request has been blocked; the content must be served over HTTPS. #28748

Closed

  • CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty #28580
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [iOS 18.3.2] ImageButton no longer working with RelayCommand in ViewModel #28692
  • Tab IsEnabled not working on Windows #28770
  • [Testing] Reenable flaky UI test with Issue12574Test #28761
  • TimePicker does not gain focus #28759
  • Hot reload not working #28749
  • App.Current.Quit doesn't work on iOS #28750
  • ImageSource FromStream from FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync gets random broken image at ContentPage.Loaded on HarmonyOS 4.2 #28745
  • MauiSplashScreen does not show under HarmonyOS 4.2 and Debug mode #28744
  • Dark/light theme button is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26862
    .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Wrong sizing using Bindable Layout #13739
  • Shell Navigation not works properly #12740
  • Crash on release build on Android (App ported from Xamarin) when App.xaml contains GridLength #17879
  • [Windows] Custom control based on ContentView not rendering #19779
  • FontImage not working as an IconImageSource for ToolbarItem on Windows. Regular image format works. #19695

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [net9.0] Update packages on net9.0 branch #28773
  • [ci] Add maui release internal #28772
  • [android] fix `Android` namespace conflicts #28771
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Revert Applying visibility change to child controls #28768
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Removing outdated menu items as Android can delete them after switching activities #28767
    community ✨
  • Include all platforms in multi project template #28766
    area-templates, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 7 #28764
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Obsolete platform-specific ListView APIs #28758
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Cleanup virtual layer measure invalidation #28756
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 6 #28747
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #28728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Add back TextTransformUtilites #28752
  • Revert "[main] [net10.0] [ci] Fix naming of workloads" #28754
  • Revert "[ci] Fix naming of workloads" #28753
  • Revert "[net10.0] [ci] Fix naming of workloads" #28755

Updated

  • [IOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #28713
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] RefreshView Loader Appears Frozen When Used with Shell TabBar - fix #27348
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-refreshview
  • Provisioning: Only install specific Android API levels if requested #28650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Upgrade to Windows App SDK 1.7 #28499
    platform/windows 🪟, area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] BackButtonBehavior IsEnabled - fix #28734
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Refresh Color not applying to RefreshView initially. #28638
    community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed NavigationStack not updating when OnAppearing is invoked #28666
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add back TextTransformUtilites #28735
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed - Shell content title not rendering in Full-Screen Mode on MacCatalyst #28468
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fixed BoxView improper rendering inside Border #28465
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetReferencesForCompilation Problem in Android #77966
  • Support for Multiple FilterText Values in CompletionItem #77964
  • Erroneous IDE0028 warning #77962

Closed

  • `dotnet format` fails with error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'XYZ' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference? #69858
    18.0
  • Loading net60 project into net472 host is not fully supported #62314
    Backlog
  • Roslyn - .Net core solution Compilation Fails #65567
    18.0
  • Unskip TestOpenSolution_NetCoreMultiTFMWithProjectReferenceToFSharp #41917
    18.0
  • [Regression] Get errors when you open two Visual Studio instances with different versions of Roslyn build tasks #36397
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenProjectAsync() does not load anything #73327
    17.13
  • GetProjectFileInfosAsync throws when it tries to delete MSBuild property from import file #31011
    Backlog
  • Cannot use MSBuildWorkspace in net46 xunit/mstest test assembly #17705
    Backlog
  • LSP implementation of run tests doesn't support MTP #77201
  • Formatting option to insert newline after file scoped namespace declarations #67400
    18.0
  • The server disconnected unexpectedly when using the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild v4.9.2 #72558
    Backlog
  • OpenSolutionAsync fails with IBuildEngine7 could not be loaded #47324
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace should pass IgnoreMissingImports for more resilient project loading #9807
    Backlog
  • How to use MSBuildWorkspace on Ubuntu #35766
    Backlog
  • System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException when calling Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.MSBuildWorkspace.Create().OpenProjectAsync #17401
    Backlog
  • Question: getting Project instances in a .NET core workspace #17968
    Backlog
  • Project.HasDocuments returned false for any NON .net core .csproj on ubuntu #29096
    Backlog
  • Found conflicts between different versions of libraries for the project under .NET Framework 4.7.2 #75497
    17.13
  • open a .sln file in linux in .netcore 2.0 console app #26623
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace can't open a VS2017 project (.Net Framework or .NetStandard) #22392
    Backlog
  • Problems with MSBuildWorkspace when VS 15.3 is installed #21583
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Copilot context provider to EA.Copilot and handler to LanguageServer #77973
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Expression trees: optional arguments #77972
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • *** WIP. Definitely needs supporting speedometer numbers before being considered *** #77971
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reapply "Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type (#77899)" (#77969) #77970
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add ignored directives feature status #77965
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Add test demonstrating issue was fixed. #77963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Revert "Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type (#77899)" #77969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Support converting a dictionary to a dictionary-expr when the target is a supported interface #77945
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Ngen Priorities for VS #77748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse compound assignment operator declarations #77943
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #77899
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Ensure that newline is inserted after file scoped namespace declarations #77821
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds to a ConcurrentDictionary #77959
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Semantic Search: Add support for async queries and FAR tool #77906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add build utils to simplify local package sharing #77822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: misc checks on receiver parameter and extension members #77937
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, VSCode, breaking-change
  • Update resourceManagement.yml #77948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `RuntimeHelpers.Await` rules #77957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • Merge features/dictionary-expressions into release/dev17.14 #77961
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When compiling with --opt-cross-module Crossgen2 can use invalid tokens #114183
  • Deadlock in loader lock (CoreCLR) from background GC in XAML apps #114182
  • Test failure: JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/LocallocCnstB5_ro/LocallocCnstB5_ro.dll #114181
    10.0.0
  • .NET 10 and Native AOT improvements for CsWinRT 3.0 #114179
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/dev10/b400791/_b400971b400971/_b400971b400971.cmd #114178
    10.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests timeout #114177
  • System.Net.Security.Unit.Tests timeout #114176
  • .NET Runtime - missing correct version! #114175
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel Add context to ModelReaderWriter to support AOT and collection scenarios #114168
  • JIT emits an array access bounds check during the value update via the for #114160
    Future
  • TryParseExact not working as expected #114159
    Future
  • [.NET 9] `RuntimeInformation.RuntimeIdentifier` includes unexpected OS details on Linux repo installs #114156
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeout #114153
  • System.Net.Security.Tests timeout #114152
  • [API Proposal]: Add PartitionedRateLimiter.TryReplenish #114151
  • [API Proposal]: Add overload of Lazy<T> constructor which allows to turn off exception caching behaviour #114147
  • Unfamiliar crash in prod environmnet c0000005 #114144
  • [WASM][MT] Failing to start inside of a web worker #114140
    Future
  • HOW TO build Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.NativeAOT.linux-bionic-arm64? #114134
  • [API Proposal]: 'ComWrappers' methods to get runtime-provided 'IUnknown' CCW vtable entries #114133

Closed

  • 'ComWrappers.ReleaseObjects' also passes aggregated objects #114043
  • [NativeAOT] Bug: ILCompiler loses specific fieldType metadata during compilation #114141
  • [Android] App crashing with condition `xref_count == xref_index' not met #106410
    Future
  • 'ComWrappers.RegisterObjectForInterface' should skip a QI if 'inner' is provided #113239
  • Assertion failed 'compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(InstructionSet_SSSE3)' during 'Importation' #114072
    10.0.0
  • How do I debug dotnet code in a hostfxr C++ app? (Not Visual Studio mixed mode) #113665
    10.0.0
  • JIT_PInvoke asm stubs missing for i386 #68411
    Future
  • SingleFile Bundler should use the managed Mach-O signer #110055
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for mapping JSON object keys to object properties via [JsonPopulateKey] in System.Text.Json #114143
  • How to deal "unresolved class" with analysis the mlpd file? #114092
  • inner loop: For WebAssembly, support building a Debug runtime and Release libraries #42553
    Future
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat is never recognized by Blazor #114135

PullRequests

Created

  • GC Bridge for Android scenarios #114184
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Move funclets invocation to code managers #114180
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Pin the System.Memory package reference version in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #114173
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix crossgen2 sometimes emitting tokens from the wrong module #114172
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • RFC: Replace CodeManState with cache in EECodeInfo for x86. #114170
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • adding runtime-outerloop to build-analysis. #114164
    needs-area-label
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • Update branding to 9.0.5 #114162
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.16 #114161
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Add support for building runtime with FEATURE_EH_FUNCLETS on win-x86 #114157
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ML-KEM: ImportFrom{Encrypted}Pem #114155
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Remove unsafe from STJ #114154
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Propagate `Type.GetInterfaces` through dataflow analysis #114149
    needs-area-label
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Delete more of ExceptionTracker code #114146
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TEST][CI] Azure Linux 3 experiments #114145
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Generating Debug Info for interpreted bytecode #114139
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fill out more SuperPMI cases for LoongArch64 and RISCV64 #114136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [mono] [hotreload] Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #113995
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix line ending #114171
    area-EnC-mono
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] 12-bit immediates in bit ops #113366
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [SGen/Tarjan] Handle edge case with node heaviness changing due to deduplication #113044
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Bring back yml necessary change types in label checkers #114167
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [9.0] Bring back yml necessary change types in label checkers #114166
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Bring back yml necessary change types in label checkers #114165
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete dead code in ExceptionTracker and leftover old EH code #114121
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • linux-x86: Implement R2R P/Invoke helpers #114142
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [9.0] libnethost no LTCG #113893
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.5
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Sign and harden pkgs #114027
    needs-area-label
  • Fix bug in hwintrinsicxarch.cpp for Shuffle methods on xarch #114125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Turn off packages for April #113718
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix ZipArchive loop condition for reading central directory headers #114023
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add field access support to CoreCLR Interpreter #114049
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Add support for importing encrypted PKCS#8 to ML-KEM #114108
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0

Updated

  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test csproj fix #114186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Propagate flow into finally regions correctly in synthesis #114016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simple intrinsics #113689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Alternate approach for HELPER_METHOD_FRAME removal for arithmetic div… #113286
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS Allowable After Attach and non immutable #113924
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Utilize `sh(x)add(.uw)` instructions #113999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix VS div-by-0 in DacEnumerableHashTable code #113892
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.5
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] profilers linking and instrumentation in AOT #114080
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove reference / redistribution of externally provided packages in MSBuild tasks #113404

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Implement suspension-aware liveness and dead-code elimination #3066
  • [RuntimeAsync] Implement new byref local zeroing #3065
  • [RuntimeAsync] Avoid keeping continuation state alive after resumption #3064

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix handling of implicit byref liveness #3067

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Clean up and document JIT parts #3063

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48124
  • `_MTPBuild` target is duplicated #48095

Closed

  • Generate a ProjectTypeGuid property for known project types #522
    10.0.1xx
  • `dotnet sln add` not consistently discovering Project Type Guids for unknown project types #47638
  • Potential telemetry cleanup logic error - unsent telemetry events buildup #41796
    Backlog
  • Installer kills software without asking #41815
    Discussion
  • [MAC]The template packages for .NET 10 Preview 3 is incorrect #48061
  • error MSB4062: The "Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.Tasks.ComputeDotnetBaselmageAndTag" task could not be loaded from the assembly C:\Users\x\.nuget\packages\microsoft.net.build.containers\8.0.101\build..'' and other errors #38330
